Articles.Content: Has anyone else had an issue with Mechjeb since this new Asteroid update? It worked fine before this update and now when Im on the launch pad the little box on the right side of the screen doesn't show up. If anyone can help that would be great thanks
Update the MJ dll found here.

I had the same problem, updating the dll a few times with a few different builds didn't work, still got nothing. Then I paid closer attention to the error message from build 197 (retrieved from above link... Thanks!!!) Your mileage might vary, depending on your OS and settings, but this worked for me in Win 8.1 Pro, and Win 7 Pro. Open the mechjeb2.dll properties: at the bottom of the window may be a note about the program originating from another computer. Unblock it, or it won't load. I unblocked the files for the pod part as well. Once done build 198 from the above link worked great. You might have to do the R&D too, depending on if you played with too much trying to get it to work.

again, ymmv.

Aha. I just fired up KSP yesterday afternoon for the first time since August of last year and I couldn't figure out why Mechjeb wasn't working (hence my visit today). But I guess this recent update may have caused that one? I'll check out the guidance above to see if that resolves the error.

As an aside, the game sure looks a lot more evolved than the last time I played it.
